title.rendered: Banger, pea and pepper casserole with baby potatoes

content.rendered:
Banger, pea and pepper casserole with baby potatoes

Ingredients

Ingredients
1 packet Fry’s Wood Smoked Breakfast Bangers (6 x 50g), cut into 2cm slices
15ml (1 Tbsp) oil
1 onion, finely chopped
5ml (1 tsp) crushed garlic
1 red pepper, sliced
Salt and pepper, to taste
1 tin chopped tomatoes
10 baby potatoes, halved
500ml (2 cups) frozen peas
Rice or crispy bread, to serve

Directions

Heat the oil in a pan and fry the onion, garlic and red pepper until soft.

Add the sliced Bangers and fry.

Then add the tin of tomatoes and halved baby potatoes, salt and pepper to taste, bring to the boil.

Reduce heat and simmer with the lid on until the potatoes are soft.

Stir in the frozen peas.

Serve with rice or crispy bread.
